name: FGA Ratings System
description: In this report we propose a scoring system for rating how safe an organization's policies, research, and products are towards advancing AI capabilities in a similar manner to how ESG ratings work with regards to a company’s environmental safety. We name this rating system FGA which stands for Forecasting, Governance, and Alignment. We do not claim to provide one coherent final structure but rather take the approach of proposing multiple hypotheses and show the inroads for thinking about each we could come up with in the time frame of the hackathon.
